html:
Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_ge5o0end&referenceId=1_ge5o0end&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Stocktube

Description: Seraphim Space Investment Trust PLC (LSE:SSIT) chief executive Mark Boggett joined Proactive's Stephen Gunnion with full details of the company's maiden set of quarterly results since floating in July.Boggett telling Proactive that the company is encouraged by the performance of its portfolio in the short period since IPO. He said the space tech investment market remains buoyant, with record levels of private investment.The investment community and wider world is now increasingly recognising both the attraction of space tech's long-term growth potential and the unique role it can play in helping to address some of our most pressing challenges, he added.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3cryVS9
